sudarshiye pawathwena keti sinama ulelak thulin anagatha sinama niyamuwan parikshawata bhajanaya kerana padanamak wana athara lankiya sinamawata nawa jawayakda ekathu kirimata adahas kere. 1943 layanal wentad kalagaraya padaka karagena hadunu 43 kandayamada, 1962 di sudarshiya haraha sugathapalada da silwa mul karagena ape kattiya haraha natya kalawa poshanaya kala ayurin, 2017 di sudarshiye api dijital yugaye nawa sinamawakata mula purannemu.
